item.title: Mentioned by Daily Commercial News
item.description:
The Harper Government Selects the Future Site of the Public Service Pay Centre
16, 2013) - Tilly O'Neill-Gordon, Member of Parliament for Miramichi, on behalf of the Honourable Rona Ambrose, Minister of Public Works and Government Services and Minister for Status of Women, announced today that the Government of Canada has purchased land for the permanent facility for the Public Service Pay Centre in Miramichi, and has officially launched a Request for Qualification process for the ... This facility will house 550 public service employees here in Miramichi," said MP O'Neill-Gordon.

item.title: Mentioned by Daily Commercial News
item.description:
The Government of Canada Awards Lease Contract for New Employees of the ...
MIRAMICHI, NEW BRUNSWICK--(Marketwire - Oct. 11, 2012) - Today, Tilly O'Neill-Gordon, Member of Parliament for Miramichi, on behalf of the Honourable Rona Ambrose, Minister of Public Works and Government Services and Minister for Status of Women, announced the signing of a lease contract for temporary office space to accommodate Public Service Pay Centre employees in Miramichi, New Brunswick. The lease ... They will join the 146 employees already working in Miramichi," said MP O'Neill-Gordon.
